We need to make forward-looking investments to upgrade California’s infrastructure to meet our state’s growing needs and address climate change.

These issues are important to me: I developed a comprehensive long-term strategy for CA’s water challenges that includes storing and recycling water and building levees and other infrastructure to help our communities.

Extreme weather events and rising sea levels can affect critical infrastructure like our airports, bridges, highways, tunnels, and more. Americans deserve a reliable infrastructure network, which is why we need to #ActOnClimate pic.twitter.com/kuQ5ifkEQU
